name: Swissotel Zurich

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel has a wonderful breakfast, is located right across the street from the train station & has bigger than average rooms with comfortable beds. Our airlines lost our luggage & the people at the front desk were very kind to us and kept in contact with the airline to locate our bags. They were also good about helping us find our way with train schedules. I was very impressed with this hotel!
reviews.title: Great service!

reviews.text: This hotel was the best hotel in which we stayed during our Switzerland tour..it was like a 5 star hotel and the hotel is right behind the tram station and the railway station:)the view from the top floor is simply spectacular..do check out the swimming pool and the sauna room:)..rooms were wonderful and the bed was soo awesome!!i really wish to come back to Zurich just to stay in this hotel..but the only thing which was missing was free wifi...though u get free wifi on the ground floor..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night in July. The hotel was easily found from the airport by taking the train to Oerlikon station and crossing the road to the hotel. This is a well kept, efficiently run business type hotel although and although we were on vacation, it suited our needs very well. The beds were comfortable and access to old Zurich and the lake is very simple by hopping on the train for a ten minute journey. Zurich itself is very expensive but this hotel was very reasonably priced.
reviews.title: Perfect for quick visit to Zurich

reviews.text: We stayed there with my family and the hotel of superb. The People and Service was outstanding. The wifi was free, parking was charged but not too expensive and the breakfast was in comparision to any 5 star hotel with wide selection of food to meet all our needs. The rooms are very clean with new decor and very comfortable sleep quality bed. The gym needs some good equipment. The location is not superb but not far from the city centre. We would use this hotel again, anytime we visit zurich.

description: Zurich’s tallest luxury hotel, Swissotel Zurich is ideally located close to Zurich’s business, cultural, shopping and entertainment areas and just 5km from both Zurich Airport and Zurich’s city centre. The 347 contemporary rooms and suites reflect an elegant & modern style, featuring panoramic views of Zurich and the superb Swiss Alps. You’ll enjoy a full range of leisure facilities such as the Amrita Spa & Fitness centre, which offers invigorating treatments and has a spectacular rooftop infinity pool. Meet friends or colleagues for cocktails at Le Muh Bar; enjoy fine dining at Restaurant Le Muh privé and creative Swiss meals at Le Muh léger. Swissotel Zurich’s Convention Centre is the perfect setting for any event or conference and caters for up to 1000 participants. All rooms are non-smoking.
